page.title: 14NEW PORTALOO,CARBOST.
page.content: Because of the demand created by tourism,mainly due to visitors to the distillery,public toilets have been erected in the village near the shores of the loch. It is made up of demountable units, which come in ready made sections,making building very easy and quick.Only the foundations and drains needed to be prepared beforehand and the area painted and tidied afterwards. Because of this speed they have earned the nickname of 'Portaloo'. One person in the village has been given the job of looking after the toilets and keeping them clean.
